description:
Kyururu and company are at a loss when they turn to the next page of Kyururu`s sketchbook, which depicts a strange building they don`t recognize. Then they meet a Friend who travels around between all areas of the park, and she offers to take them to where the building is. Meanwhile, the Professor and Assistant realize that there`s something unusual about the Ceruleans that have been appearing around Japari Park. They finally figure out what`s causing these bizarre appearances, but the reason is beyond their expectations...
Source: crunchyroll
